definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Are there any differences between public and private schools?
sentences.chinese: 公立學校和私立學校有什麼不同嗎？

sentences.english: Socialization is one reason I wanted my son to attend public initially.
sentences.chinese: 社會化是我最初想讓我兒子去公立學校的一個原因。

sentences.english: and in public schools, you can basically wear whatever you want.
sentences.chinese: 在公立學校，你基本上想穿什麼就穿什麼。

sentences.english: DeVos seeks to use public school money to support the choice.
sentences.chinese: 德沃斯試圖用公立學校的錢支持擇校。

sentences.english: We looked at the public universities as well.
sentences.chinese: 我們也會關注一些公立學校。

sentences.english: The state’s constitution demands that the state “cherish” its public schools.
sentences.chinese: 州法規要求本州要“愛護”公立學校。

sentences.english: In 1995, there were two single-sex public schools operating in this country.
sentences.chinese: 1995年，兩所單性別公立學校在鄉下開辦。

sentences.english: The public schools are administered by local school boards-------groups of people elected by the voters.
sentences.chinese: 公立學校由選民選出的地方教育董事會管理。

sentences.english: I am a Christian and taught in public school for 31 years.
sentences.chinese: 我是個基督徒，在公立學校教了31年書。

sentences.english: She moved to Dallas and became a public-school teacher.
sentences.chinese: 她遷往達拉斯，成爲一所公立學校的教師。

sentences.english: She supports the teaching of creationism in public schools, alongside evolution.
sentences.chinese: 她認爲公立學校應該同時教授上帝創世說和進化論。

sentences.english: The food sure beat public school's mystery meatloaf.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的食物比公立學校的烘肉卷好多了。

sentences.english: The public school sector maintains dual vocational (SMK) and professional streaming (SMU).
sentences.chinese: 公立學校保有技術性和專業性的雙重業教育。

sentences.english: They have embraced market reform of state schools.
sentences.chinese: 他們接受了公立學校的市場化改革。

sentences.english: It also included physical education teachers from Washington public schools.
sentences.chinese: 它還包括從華盛頓公立學校的體育教師。

sentences.english: The subjects included 1062 teachers from public schools .
sentences.chinese: 調查研究以公立學校1062位教師爲樣本。

definition: student of a senior high school
